products.title: Oslo Blackout Scarlet Red Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling oslo blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home. This bold scarlet red roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.

products.title: Trinity (Blackout), Poppy Red - Roller Blind
products.description: Trinity (blackout) poppy red is a colour that evokes memories, passion, and plenty of amazing new ideas. It's all about taking the time to fall in love with your decor, and not being afraid to try something new. The gentle weave sits in the background, but it's the homely red that really catches the eye. Matching to trinity (blackout) poppy red is all about taking the time to get the balance right.

products.title: Konya Blackout Scarlett Red
products.description: Konya blackout scarlett red plain roller blind the konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester, with a pvc blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade.

products.title: Cordoba Blackout Scarlet Roller Blind
products.description: The cordoba scarlet blackout roller blind is a bright red tone, just like a ripe tomato or fiery chilli. This blind will make a real statement hanging at the window. products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Geisha Red Roller Blind
products.description: With a restful, japanese floral pattern, this roller blind delivers an air of zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches with a hint of red. Cherry blossom blackout geisha red blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. Product id: db-rbx2241 fabric colour: geisha red material: 80% polyester 20% cotton lining: white backing headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er3 - highest energy saving value - uv protection and effective thermal retention blackout: yes cherry blossom blackout geisha red roller blind in red/pink.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Fired Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Fired earth is more than a blackout blind that allows you to drift off the moment your head hits the pillow. It's a symphony of exotic hues that holds the keys to unlocking the full potential of your interiors. The reds and oranges are finely tempered by the strands of white that intricately weave their way through the fabric. Combine fired earth with some terracotta whenever the option presents itself and you won't be disappointed.

products.title: Kenton Blackout Loganberry Roller Blind
products.description: Layered leaves beautifully adorn the super soft fabric of this voyage design. Intricately designed, kenton loganberry has been digitally printed onto indulgently soft roller fabric to really capture the essence of the original artwork. Full of colour and vibrance, the gorgeou layered leaves beautifully adorn the super soft fabric of this voyage design.
